name: The totally-safe-and-explosion-free Heist
description:
This is The Totally-safe-and-explosion-free Heist. A heist game where you must steal  explosive BIONITE™ cylinders and attempt not to get shot by the guards.

######################################################

The Evil PFG's (People's Federation of the Galaxy) control over the Galaxy grows every day, and so do the possibilities for the Rebellion to defeat it grow slimmer. Yet there is still hope for a happy future for the galaxy. But now tales of a secret super weapon being built by the PFG reach the Rebellions ears, and you have been sent to various head-quarters of the PFG, where you must retrieve BIONITE™ cylinders which are vital to the building of this super-weapon. 

######################################################

This game was made for the Ludum Dare 49 Compo game jam. If you are unfamiliar with the term, the Compo is one of the two Ludum Dare events that run at the same time biannually. The other is your classical 72 hour jam, where you can work in teams, and use pre-made assets you have the rights to use. In the Compo however, you must work solo, do it in 48 hours, and you have to make EVERYTHING yourself.
